metadata.creator: Sergio Contreras
metadata.description: Los Jaivas; a chilean folk band plays a concert at the Edmonton Jubilee Auditorium; incorporating traditional Chilean folk instruments with electric guitars and synthesizers.
metadata.title: Programa Nosotros.
